seekers._comment: If any of these seekers are present, alter the X label accordingly

config._comment: If any of these variables are present in the config, alter the X label accordingly

mapping._comment5: SEC + RESP; variable uptake fuel payments (B2)
mapping._comment11: ETH + RESP; variable uptake fuel payments (B2)
mapping._comment15: SEC + DEP; variable uptake fuel payments (B2)
mapping._comment18: ETH + DEP; variable uptake fuel payments (B2)

variablesByType._comment2: (Gov). NB. Link between conditions and income captured (indirectly) elsewhere so all initial gas the same for all conditions

baseline._comment_1: Allows for payoff to be contextualised by real data
baseline._comment_2: The environment (hider) in which the baseline data is taken
baseline._comment_3: Invert if higher baseline data is worse, so better payoff should decrease

sRandomWalkLowGas._comment_1: Non-winter month health utilisation by low SEC with asthma
sRandomWalkLowGas._comment_2: Payoff received when simulating the same environment (non-winter) for the same individuals (low SEC with asthma)
